Package com.optiply.endpoint.controllers

Class JSONControllerIntegrationTests

java.lang.Object
com.optiply.endpoint.environment.TestEnvironment
com.optiply.endpoint.controllers.JSONControllerIntegrationTests
@TestMethodOrder(org.junit.jupiter.api.MethodOrderer.OrderAnnotation.class) @TestInstance(PER_CLASS) public class JSONControllerIntegrationTests extends TestEnvironment
Integration tests, by unit testing the controller.
